title: Charlotte traffic: Injury wreck on Brookshire Boulevard
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer: Local - Today 
A wreck with injuries has been reported on Brookshire Boulevard at Mount Holly-Huntersville Road. Use Rozzelles Ferry Road as an alternate. ...
